body: Pro tip: If you're alone and angry. Go onto r34 and look at the tags "Where is your god now" and "has science gone too far?". Your anger will hopefully be replaced hy disgust or amusement. Worst case scenario you get even angrier at humanity.
I believe in slime supremacy

nice
morphing girlfriend that won't cheat
they forgot the loli tag

@teste8852 I'm hoping she shapeshifted into two separate people, the younger brother and older sister (since they're having sex so casually).

Though, it's also possible she shapeshifted into the boy's older sister and they sorta pulled a "prank" on him. I really prefer the first tho and given this artist's previous work with the slime creature being able to form hive minds made up of separate individuals, I'd put my money on that.

@BebeHillz I mean, people like tight pussies, and it doesnt get much tighter than a little kid lol. I dont think that many people are attracted to lolicon for aesthetic reasons. (Tho its still quite popular for that reason too)

Well whatever, I enjoy fapping to both.
